recipesJson.name: Baccy Brulee
recipesJson.author: hibbadoray
recipesJson.description: For those of you who know me and my obsession with all things creme brulee, you had to know this day was coming. It's surprisingly good lol. There's a LOT of tobacco flavor here...softened and sweetened and caramelized by the creme brulee. It's a very smooth and dessert vape. I hope you enjoy it.
